sentences.en: After his election defeat he was reassigned to the diplomatic service.
sentences.cn: 落选之后，他又被派到外交部门工作。

sentences.en: Attempts are being made to settle the dispute by diplomatic means.
sentences.cn: 正在努力通过外交途径解决争端。

sentences.en: Britain and Argentina reopened diplomatic relations.
sentences.cn: 英国和阿根廷重新建立了外交关系。

sentences.en: Diplomatic efforts to end the fighting began on October 25.
sentences.cn: 停战的外交努力于10月25日开始。

sentences.en: Diplomatic relations were frozen until August this year.
sentences.cn: 外交关系直到今年8月才解冻。

sentences.en: Greece has established full diplomatic relations with Israel.
sentences.cn: 希腊已经和以色列建立了全面的外交关系。

sentences.en: His books on diplomatic history were eminently readable.
sentences.cn: 他写的有关外交史的书可读性非常强。

sentences.en: His visit is expected to lead to the restoration of diplomatic relations.
sentences.cn: 人们期待他的出访会恢复外交关系。

sentences.en: My limited diplomatic skills were tested to the utmost.
sentences.cn: 我有限的外交手腕儿受到了极其严峻的考验。

sentences.en: Sloane used inside diplomatic information to make himself rich.
sentences.cn: 斯隆利用外交内幕消息发了财。

sentences.en: The President's envoy set off on another diplomatic trip.
sentences.cn: 总统的使节开始了又一次外交之旅。

sentences.en: The proposal offered both sides a way out of the diplomatic impasse.
sentences.cn: 这一提议使双方都能摆脫外交僵局.

sentences.en: The tone of his language was diplomatic and polite.
sentences.cn: 他说话圆通得体、彬彬有礼。

sentences.en: The two sides would like to see the normalisation of diplomatic relations.
sentences.cn: 双方都愿意看到外交关系的正常化。

sentences.en: We were both strangers to diplomatic life.
sentences.cn: 我们俩在外交方面都是生手。

words.tran_cn: 在外交上；靠外交途径；圆滑地；婉转地
外交；外交手腕；交际手段
外交家，外交官；有外交手腕的人；处事圆滑机敏的人

phrases.tran_cn: n. 外交部门；驻外部门

trans.tran_cn: 外交（官）的，有手腕的，策略的
trans.tran_en: relating to or involving the work of diplomats
